name: CreateFlow
signal_source: Creative platform reviews emphasize need for authentic expression tools that aren't subject to algorithmic manipulation
description: Distraction-free creative workspace that blocks social feeds and notifications during creative sessions
target_user: Digital creators who struggle to maintain creative focus due to social media interruptions and algorithmic pressure
pain_point_evidence: Artists report frustration with platforms that manipulate content visibility and interrupt creative flow with engagement demands
differentiation: Creation-focused vs. engagement-driven, prioritizes creative flow over social metrics
subscription_fit: Premium includes cloud storage, advanced tools, and optional portfolio features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic workspace, premium for cloud storage and advanced features
